post.body: enooooooo!
thanks :) stay warm and see you in 11 days!
I hear you on the chocolate, we've got a basket sitting on the conference table and it keeps looking at me.
get well!! :(
DORK! :) That was good...I'll have to forward you my Verizon check.
perhaps you're standing under the sprinklers? take a step to the right, maybe it'll stop raining :)
no way I can compete with those adorable kids! :)
And her skis are headed north for her first taste of snice!! W00tles!
No red dress, but 80s outfit secured! Check check! (And maybe one pair of super hawt shoes...) yay for christmas sales!
Is trying on a red silk dress for nye
gym, holiday dinner. And definitely looking forward to seeing the mass of last minute Christmas sales this weekend. Where are you shopping?
is having a cuppa and watching the big fluffy snow. 'Tis the season!
is looking for ShareASale merchants that will be at the Affiliate Summit in Vegas this January. Can you d or @ me please?
it's not that 4th quarter is stressful, it's just that the pace is nuts. I spend 9 months anticipating 4Q, and what do I get? A pimple.
I get so caught up in the minutiae that sometimes I lose sight of the people & the moments that really matter. Life's short, see the beauty.
The quietude of winter is reflective.
fixed kitchen drain and second bathroom faucet today. Spent money saved on plumbing on a cute new jacket. Girls can be handy too!
too warm for snow. :( Backup plan = retail therapy. Must...help...economy.
is tree up! tree up!
is going to work/errands today, and hit the icy Wisconsin slopes tomorrow!
